title: FP to restore equilibrium after export decrease

content.prompt: Following a decrease in exports, what fiscal policy would restore the economy to the original equilibrium?

choices.label: An increase in the income tax rate
A reduction in the government budget deficit
An open-market purchase of bonds by the central bank
An open-market sale of bonds by the central bank

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
